name: Heartsmith & Delivery
description:
Story:

A young couple owns a heart repair and delivery shop. You must help them keep the store open. Repair hearts and deliver them to the city.  But beware one false click could bring about the apocalypse!

Controls:

You left click and drag the repair tools on to the heart in the center of the screen for the Repair Shop Part. To complete the Delivery Part left click on the red icons.  You may have to double click left to make them disappear. Be careful to avoid hitting the street or it may disappear causing the apocalypse.

All assets and coding done by me.

Software used:

- Unreal Engine 5 for Programming/ Assembly

- Adobe Photoshop for all visual arts

- MuseScore 4 for background music
